experience.title: experience
experience.description: With 4 years of experience in web development, I have worked on various projects as a Freelance developer, as well as securing contracts with medium and large companies. My work includes creating websites, modifying existing projects, and developing custom web solutions tailored to specific business logic. I have successfully delivered projects that align with client needs, ensuring that the functionality supports their business objectives.

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description:
Programming Languages: PHP, Python, JavaScript

Frameworks: Laravel, Vue.js, React, Nuxt.js

Content Management Systems (CMS): WordPress (custom plugin development)

Database Management: MySQL, PostgreSQL

Version Control: Git, GitHub

DevOps Tools: Docker

Web Development: HTML, CSS, RESTful APIs

Responsive Design: Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS

Web Hosting: cPanel, Linux, Hestiacp

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description:
Problem-Solving: Strong analytical skills for troubleshooting and resolving complex issues.

Communication: Effective communicator with the ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.

Time Management: Ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

Collaboration: Experience working in team environments, both remotely and in-person.

Adaptability: Quick learner who stays updated with the latest industry trends and technologies.

Attention to Detail: Focused on delivering high-quality work with precision and accuracy.

Self-Motivation: Proactive in identifying and addressing challenges without the need for constant supervision.

bio.title: bio
bio.description:
About me
I am a passionate Full Stack Developer with 5 years of experience specializing in PHP, Python, and JavaScript. My expertise spans across multiple frameworks and platforms, including Laravel, WordPress (with custom plugin development), Vue.js, React, and Nuxt.js. I am also proficient in containerization using Docker. My focus is on building robust, scalable web applications that provide seamless user experiences, and I thrive in both front-end and back-end development environments. I continuously seek to expand my skills and take on new challenges in the ever-evolving tech landscape.

education.title: education
education.description: My education has been entirely self-taught, achieved through a wide range of online courses. I have dedicated significant time and effort to independent learning, acquiring Full Stack development skills and knowledge through various educational platforms and digital resources. This self-discipline has allowed me to master multiple technologies and stay up-to-date in a constantly evolving field.

sports.title: sports
sports.description: I am passionate about playing football and volleyball. Currently, I am more active in mountain biking, which is one of my favorite activities.

favorite-games.title: favorite-games
favorite-games.description: My current favorite video games include League of Legends, Crusader Kings III, and Call of Duty: Warzone. At the moment, I spend the most time playing Crusader Kings III.
